item.title: Jim Cramer counters Amazon and Apple downgrades - CNBC
item.description:
1. Jim Cramer counters Amazon and Apple downgrades  CNBC
  2. Downgrades can really hurt long-term investors, says Jim Cramer  MSN
  3. The problem — and opportunity — with Wall Street downgrades of Apple and Amazon  CNBC
  4. Monday, October 7, 2024: Cramer breaks down the analyst downgrade of this mega cap tech stock  CNBC

item.title: Planetary Defense Mission: Hera Launches for Asteroid Crash Scene Investigation - SciTechDaily
item.description:
1. Planetary Defense Mission: Hera Launches for Asteroid Crash Scene Investigation  SciTechDaily
  2. Hera spacecraft to visit Dimorphos asteroid that humans knocked off course  BBC.com
  3. European spacecraft launches for ‘crash scene investigation’ of first planetary defense test  CNN
  4. SpaceX rocket launches Europe's Hera planetary defense probe to visit asteroid smacked by NASA  Space.com
  5. ESA’s Hera spacecraft launches on SpaceX’s Falcon 9 rocket as Hurricane Milton takes aim at Florida  Spaceflight Now

item.title: China’s Monster Amphibious Assault Ship Has Twin Island Superstructures Optimized For Aviation Ops
34-year-old Hubble Telescope does it again - NASA uncovers unusual galaxy using Hubble photography
Amazon Fire tablets are already up to 56% off on October Prime Day
item.description: On Amazon's October Prime Day, Fire tablets are already up to 56% off, including the Fire HD 8 tablet and the Fire HD 10.

item.title: Never lose track of your wallet again with a 3-pack of smart tracking cards on sale for under $90
item.description: The KeySmart SmartCard offers tracking with Apple’s Find My app and wireless charging for your devices. Get a 3-pack on sale for under $90.

item.title: Astronomers just found a galaxy way too advanced for its time
item.description: Galaxies as orderly as the Milky Way weren't supposed to exist more than 10 billion years ago. Now astronomers have found one in the first billion years of the universe.

item.title: Tired of low storage warnings? Get 2TB of cloud storage for life at just $89
item.description: FileJump offers 2TB of cloud storage with a lifetime subscription, giving you secure space for all your files. Get it while it's on sale for $89 in October.

item.title: Can't swing a fancy Dyson vacuum? This cordless stick vacuum is only $119.99.
item.description: The Farberware Cordless Pro Stick Vacuum offers powerful, budget-friendly cleaning with versatile attachments and long battery life — on sale for $119.99.

item.title: Apple tech without the Apple price — this MacBook Air is a steal at 69% off
item.description: Get the refurbished 2018 Apple MacBook Air 13.3-inch laptop while it's on sale at the Mashable Shop and priced at $369.99.

item.title: Best gaming laptops 2024: Grab these on Prime Day
item.description: We tested a range of gaming laptops from brands like Asus, Razer, and Alienware. Check out our top picks for every budget, and be sure to check back during Oct. Prime Day, because some of these models may be on sale.

item.title: Amazon has one pretty good deal on a 2-in-1 laptop on October Prime Day
item.description: We're keeping track of the best 2-in-1 laptop deals on Amazon on Prime Big Deal Days, its "October Prime Day" sale. So far, there's just one worth grabbing.

item.title: Amazon has dropped a new Fire HD 8 tablet — and it's already 45% off for October Prime Day
item.description: Amazon's best October Prime Day tablet deals include a steep discount on the updated Fire HD 8 and a new all-time low for Apple's M4 iPad Pro.

item.title: Upgrade your desk setup with one of these keyboard deals live on October Prime Day
item.description: Prime Big Deal Days starts on Oct. 8. Amazon has keyboard deals from Keychron, Royal Kludge, Epomaker, Logitech, and more. Check out 15 of our top picks.

item.title: The best Chromebook deals available on October Prime Day aren't on Amazon
item.description: The best Chromebook deals available on October Prime Day aren't on Amazon — but that could change soon.

item.title: All the best Apple MacBook deals on October Prime Day
item.description: The best Apple MacBook deals on Prime Big Deal Days include record-low pricing on the M3 MacBook Pro and the M2 MacBook Air.

item.title: Amazon's Prime Day laptop deals are finally ramping up: Shop record lows on Apple, LG, and Acer
item.description: Grab the best Prime Day laptop deals on the Acer Swift X 14 and M3 MacBook Pro. Save up to $400.

item.title: This NARWAL robot vacuum is at its lowest-ever price on October Prime Day
item.description: Amazon Prime Day Deal: Save $350 on NARWAL Freo Robot Vacuum.
